Text:
Please sir may I have some more ? 

(Thanks!)

Hello 80zforever .... You really have an amazing collection, thanks for all you have uploaded !!
But ... I am having trouble finding a few songs that I'm not even sure I have the names correct maybe you could help me, I didn't know where to speak to you so i hope you see this post ... lol , here goes nothing.
1. this one i only know some lyrics from , see how good you are...they go " I had a dream and the dream came true, I saw a ghost and the ghost was you ... but it was only make believe ..."
Actually I think I'll make a mp3 sample with bits and pieces of the songs in question, that should be a lot better. I'll try and post one in a few days. thx

Xenon4U2C -

I think that's a Thompson Twins song called "Oumma Aularesso (Animal Laugh)" from their first album, "A Product Of..."

http://www.discogs.com/Thompson-Twins-A-Product-Of/master/85528

JonYo, I don't think that's The Thompson Twins song. Oumma Aularesso lyrics are different. I am sure this is an italo-disco song I might have heard a while back but just passed. I am not positive though. A sample of the song will help for sure.

Hi 80zforever, your uploads are amazing thank you so much! We've been grabbing gem after gem thanks to you making them available.  I was wondering if you perhaps have these 2 albums: Red 7 - When the Sun Goes Down (1987) & Spoons - Bridges over Borders (1986).  I've been searching for a while now for a download somewhere, but no luck.  Would love to add them to my collection.  I'm hoping you can work your magic.  Good luck and thanks again.
Fiz
Oops, I made a mistake.  I meant the song "Make Believe" by the Thompson Twins, from their first record, "...A Product Of".  I'm pretty sure that's it.

not heard of this...I'll give it a shot.
Thanks 80zforever.
